plot outline: Bodha is a quirky crime-comedy story of a youngster who becomes a gigolo to make his acting dream come true. When his friend offers him a chance to earn crores by stealing money from his client's house, he accepts it and gets into deeper problems.
title: Bodha
plot: _Bodha_ (qv) is a quirky crime-comedy story of a youngster who becomes a gigolo to make his acting dream come true. When his friend offers him a chance to earn crores by stealing money from his client's house, he accepts it and gets into deeper problems.
